channel.title: Saint's Row IV gets SDK
channel.description:
[url='https://www.pcgamer.com/2014/09/03/saints-row-iv-gets-first-stage-of-sdk-will-let-players-design-their-own-weapons/']The first stage of the rollout of their SDK is based around adding new guns to the game.[/url] Further functionality to follow.
Hopefully this means someone mods in SR:TT's Penetrator so I can knock aliens around with a gigantic, jiggle physics-enabled phallus-bat.
